backend/main.mo: Actor storing and mutating player state such as stress, flags, scene, and barricaded doors with query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping rendering and overlay fixes to specific frontend files with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑line summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme OKLCH color variables and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping GameView in a dark‑mode ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/game/Audio/audioSettingsSto: Zustand store persisting audio volume and mute settings with setters.
Hook generating a distance‑based tension hum using Web Audio, modulated by mouth reveal and volume settings.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/DialogueConte: Context managing dialogue queue, visibility, timing, and processing helpers.
frontend/src/game/Dialogue/scriptedLines: Simple object containing predefined enemy dialogue strings.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/gree: AI hook switching between idle, patrol, and chase based on player distance and triggering dialogue.
frontend/src/game/Enemies/GreenHood/Gree: Enemy entity that moves toward AI targets, handles hood reveal state, and exposes imperative controls.
3D model of the Green Hood with hoodie, glowing eyes, and teeth‑revealing mouth when triggered.
frontend/src/game/Gameplay/hoodFallMecha: Implements a hood-fall reaction event with timing, look detection using dot products, and stress penalty logic.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main scene component configuring Canvas tone mapping and composing world, player controller, scene director, and HUD.
frontend/src/game/Input/useInputMode.ts: Chooses between touch and keyboard/mouse input modes and exposes movement, look, and interaction state.
frontend/src/game/Input/useKeyboardMouse: Tracks keyboard movement, mouse look deltas, and interact key state with periodic updates.
frontend/src/game/Input/useTouchLook.ts: Generates look deltas from right‑side touch movement, accumulating and emitting them at intervals.
frontend/src/game/Player/PlayerControlle: Applies movement and camera rotation based on input and updates global player position each frame.
frontend/src/game/Scenes/SceneDirector.t: Triggers scripted dialogue events when entering specific scenes, starting with the intro sequence.
frontend/src/game/State/usePlayerState.t: Manages player state synced with backend actor calls, including stress, scene, inventory, and save status.
frontend/src/game/World/FacilityWorld.ts: Defines the 3D facility environment with lighting, cafeteria, corridor structures, and flickering effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Offers React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global styles, color tokens, and horror-themed component utilities such as threat-text and jagged-border.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
Renders a mobile interact button that briefly triggers an interact input on touch.
Displays a temporary interaction prompt placeholder if a prompt string is set.
Implements a touch-controlled virtual joystick that emits normalized movement input.
frontend/src/ui/Dialogue/DialogueBox.tsx: Shows a jagged-frame dialogue box at the bottom of the screen using current dialogue context.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/HudShell.tsx: Composes HUD elements including overlays, dialogue, stress indicator, settings, and mobile controls.
frontend/src/ui/Hud/StressIndicator.tsx: Displays the player's stress value with a color-coded bar and numeric percentage.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/FadeToBlack.tsx: Renders a timed fade-to-black overlay when activated.
frontend/src/ui/Overlays/HoodVignetteOve: Adds a hood-shaped vignette overlay with multiply blending.
frontend/src/ui/Settings/SettingsPanel.t: Provides a settings dialog with audio volume and mute controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, issues, and design notes for a 3D horror game.
